00033 //
00034 // Note: Must deallocate szData buffer after use
00035 //
00036 char* BlobReader::readFile(string strBlobFile, size_t& numBytes)
00037 {
00038     numBytes = -1;
00039     size_t fileSize = BlobReader::getFileSize(strBlobFile);
00040     if (fileSize < 0) {
00041         return NULL;
00042     }
00043 
00044     FILE* fp = fopen(strBlobFile.c_str(), "rb");
00045     if (fp == NULL) {
00046         return NULL;
00047     }
00048 
00049     char* szData = new char[fileSize + 1];
00050     szData[0] = '\0';
00051     numBytes = fread(szData, 1, fileSize, fp);
00052     if (numBytes < 0) {
00053         return NULL;
00054     }
00055     szData[numBytes] = '\0';
00056 
00057     fclose(fp);
00058 
00059     return szData;
00060 }
00061 
00062 size_t BlobReader::getFileSize(string strFile)
00063 {
00064     size_t fileSize = 0;
00065 
00066     FILE* file = fopen(strFile.c_str(), "rb");
00067     if (!file) { return 0; }
00068 
00069 #ifdef WIN32
00070     _fseeki64(file, 0, SEEK_END);
00071     fileSize = _ftelli64(file);
00072 #else
00073     fseeko64(file, 0, SEEK_END);
00074     fileSize = ftello64(file);
00075 #endif
00076 
00077     fclose(file);
00078 
00079     return fileSize;
00080 }

00082 bool BlobReader::is64BitFile(string strFile)
00083 {
00084     size_t fileSize = BlobReader::getFileSize(strFile);
00085     return (fileSize >= 0xffffffff);
00086 }
00087 
00088 int BlobReader::bytesForField(string strFieldType)
00089 {
00090     if (strFieldType == "byte" || strFieldType == "char" || strFieldType == "int8") {
00091         return 1;
00092     }
00093     else if (strFieldType == "int16") {
00094         return 2;
00095     }
00096     else if (strFieldType == "int32" || strFieldType == "float32") {
00097         return 4;
00098     }
00099     else if (strFieldType == "int64" || strFieldType == "float64") {
00100         return 8;
00101     }
00102     else {
00103         return 0;
00104     }
00105 }

00107 void BlobReader::reset()
00108 {
00109     m_strErrMsg = "";
00110     m_strBlobFile = "";
00111     m_strIndexFile = "";
00112 
00113     m_fileHandle = NULL;
00114     m_iFileSize = 0;
00115     m_iFilePosition = 0;
00116     m_bOpen = false;
00117 
00118     resetBuffer();
00119     m_indexReader.reset();
00120 }

00122 void BlobReader::resetBuffer()
00123 {
00124     m_szBuffer[0] = '\0';
00125     m_iBufferLength = 0;
00126     m_iBufferPosition = 0;
00127     m_bEndOfFile = false;
00128 }

00130 bool BlobReader::initFolder(string strPackageFolder)
00131 {
00132     if (!Fs::dirExists(strPackageFolder)) {
00133         setErrMsg("Failed to initialize blob reader, package folder does not exist.\tFolder: " + strPackageFolder);
00134         return false;
00135     }
00136 
00137     setBlobFile(Fs::join(strPackageFolder, BAT_AXIOMDATA_DIR, sBAT_BLOB_FILE));
00138     setIndexFile(Fs::join(strPackageFolder, BAT_AXIOMDATA_DIR, sBAT_BLOB_INDEX_FILE));
00139 
00140     return true;
00141 }
00142 
00143 bool BlobReader::init(string strBlobFile, string strIndexFile)
00144 {
00145     if (strIndexFile == "") {
00146         strIndexFile = Fs::join(Fs::dirname(strBlobFile), sBAT_BLOB_INDEX_FILE);
00147     }
00148 
00149     if (!Fs::fileExists(strBlobFile)) {
00150         setErrMsg("Failed to initialize blob reader, blob file does not exist.\tBlobFile: " + strBlobFile);
00151         return false;
00152     }
00153 
00154     if (!Fs::fileExists(strIndexFile)) {
00155         setErrMsg("Failed to initialize blob reader, index file does not exist.\tIndexFile: " + strIndexFile);
00156         return false;
00157     }
00158 
00159     setBlobFile(strBlobFile);
00160     setIndexFile(strIndexFile);
00161 
00162     return true;
00163 }

00165 bool BlobReader::open()
00166 {
00167     return open(getBlobFile(), getIndexFile());
00168 }
00169 
00170 bool BlobReader::open(string strBlobFile, string strIndexFile)
00171 {
00172     clearErrMsg();
00173 
00174     try {
00175         setOpen(false);
00176 
00177         // load blob index file if available
00178         if (!readIndexFile(strIndexFile)) {
00179             return false;
00180         }
00181 
00182         // open blob file seeking
00183         setFileSize(BlobReader::getFileSize(strBlobFile));
00184         setFilePosition(0);
00185         m_fileHandle = fopen(strBlobFile.c_str(), "rb");
00186         if (m_fileHandle == NULL) {
00187             setErrMsg("Failed to open blob file for reading, file may be opened.\tBlobFile: " + strBlobFile);
00188             return false;
00189         }
00190     }
00191     catch (...) {
00192         setErrMsg("Exception occurred while opening blob file.\tBlobFile: " + strBlobFile);
00193         return false;
00194     }
00195 
00196     // blob reader is opened
00197     setBlobFile(strBlobFile);
00198     setIndexFile(strIndexFile);
00199     setOpen(true);
00200 
00201     return true;
00202 }
00203 
00204 bool BlobReader::close()
00205 {
00206     clearErrMsg();
00207 
00208     // close blob file handle
00209     if (m_fileHandle != NULL) {
00210         fclose(m_fileHandle);
00211         m_fileHandle = NULL;
00212     }
00213 
00214     reset();
00215 
00216     return true;
00217 }

00219 string BlobReader::readLine()
00220 {
00221     setErrMsg("");
00222 
00223     if (!isOpen()) {
00224         setErrMsg("Failed to read line from stream, blob file not opened.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile());
00225         return "";
00226     }
00227 
00228     if (isEndOfFile()) {
00229         return "";
00230     }
00231 
00232     return nextBufferLine();
00233 }
00234 
00235 string BlobReader::nextBufferLine()
00236 {
00237     if (m_iBufferLength == 0) {
00238         loadBufferData();
00239     }
00240 
00241     char szTemp[MAX_BUFFER + 1];
00242     string line = "";
00243     while (!isEndOfFile()) {
00244         int startPosition = getBufferPosition();
00245         bool endOfLine = false;
00246         for (; getBufferPosition() < getBufferLength(); incrementBufferPosition()) {
00247             if (m_szBuffer[getBufferPosition()] == '\n') {
00248                 endOfLine = true;
00249                 break;
00250             }
00251         }
00252         if (getBufferPosition() > startPosition) {
00253             int numBytes = getBufferPosition() - startPosition;
00254             memcpy(szTemp, &m_szBuffer[startPosition], numBytes);
00255             szTemp[numBytes] = '\0';
00256             line += szTemp;
00257         }
00258         if (endOfLine || isEndOfFile()) {
00259             if (endOfLine && line != "" && line.at(line.length() - 1) == '\r') {
00260 #ifdef WIN32
00261                 line.pop_back();
00262 #else
00263                 line = line.substr(0, line.length() - 1);
00264 #endif
00265             }
00266             incrementBufferPosition();
00267             return line;
00268         }
00269         loadBufferData();
00270     }
00271 
00272     return "";
00273 }
00274 
00275 bool BlobReader::loadBufferData()
00276 {
00277     size_t numBytes = fread(m_szBuffer, 1, MAX_BUFFER, m_fileHandle);
00278     if (numBytes != MAX_BUFFER) {
00279         setEndOfFile(true);
00280     }
00281     if (numBytes > 0) {
00282         setBufferLength((int)numBytes);
00283         setBufferPosition(0);
00284         return true;
00285     }
00286     return false;
00287 }

00289 size_t BlobReader::getCurrentFilePosition()
00290 {
00291     clearErrMsg();
00292 
00293     if (!isOpen()) {
00294         setErrMsg("Failed to get blob current position, reader not opened.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile());
00295         return -1;
00296     }
00297 
00298     if (m_fileHandle == NULL) {
00299         setErrMsg("Failed to get blob current position, file handle is invalid.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile());
00300         return -1;
00301     }
00302 
00303     size_t position = -1;
00304 
00305 #ifdef WIN32
00306     position = _ftelli64(m_fileHandle);
00307 #else
00308     position = ftello64(m_fileHandle);
00309 #endif
00310 
00311     return position;
00312 }

00314 bool BlobReader::seek(size_t fileOffset)
00315 {
00316     clearErrMsg();
00317 
00318     if (!isOpen()) {
00319         setErrMsg("Failed to seek to blob offset, reader not opened.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile());
00320         return false;
00321     }
00322 
00323     if (m_fileHandle == NULL) {
00324         setErrMsg("Failed to seek to blob offset, file handle is invalid.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile());
00325         return false;
00326     }
00327 
00328     int result = 0;
00329 
00330 #ifdef WIN32
00331     result = _fseeki64(m_fileHandle, fileOffset, SEEK_SET);
00332 #else
00333     result = fseeko64(m_fileHandle, fileOffset, SEEK_SET);
00334 #endif
00335 
00336     return (result == 0);
00337 }

00339 bool BlobReader::seekToFirstProbeSet()
00340 {
00341     return seek(0);

00343 
00344 bool BlobReader::seekToProbeSet(string strProbeSetId)
00345 {
00346     clearErrMsg();
00347 
00348     IndexTable& indexTable = m_indexReader.getIndexTable();
00349     IndexTable::iterator iterFind = indexTable.find(strProbeSetId);
00350     if (iterFind == indexTable.end()) {
00351         setErrMsg("Failed to seek to blob probeset, probeset id not found.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile() + ", IndexFile: " + getIndexFile() + ", ProbeSetId: " + strProbeSetId);
00352         return false;
00353     }    
00354 
00355     return seek(iterFind->getFileOffset());
00356 }
00357 
00358 bool BlobReader::seekToSample(string strProbeSetId, string strSampleName)
00359 {
00360     clearErrMsg();
00361 
00362     IndexHeader& indexHeader = m_indexReader.getIndexHeader();
00363     int sampleIndex = indexHeader.findSampleIndex(strSampleName);
00364     if (sampleIndex == -1) {
00365         setErrMsg("Failed to seek to blob sample, sample name not found.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile() + ", IndexFile: " + getIndexFile() + ", ProbeSetId: " + strProbeSetId + ", SampleName: " + strSampleName);
00366         return false;
00367     }
00368 
00369     IndexTable& indexTable = m_indexReader.getIndexTable();
00370     IndexTable::iterator iterFind = indexTable.find(strProbeSetId);
00371     if (iterFind == indexTable.end()) {
00372         setErrMsg("Failed to seek to blob sample, probeset id not found.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile() + ", IndexFile: " + getIndexFile() + ", ProbeSetId: " + strProbeSetId);
00373         return false;
00374     }
00375 
00376     size_t probeSetOffset = iterFind->getFileOffset();
00377     size_t sampleOffset = sampleIndex * indexHeader.getBytesPerSample(iterFind->getNumAlleles());
00378 
00379     return seek(probeSetOffset + sampleOffset);
00380 }

00382 bool BlobReader::skipToNextSample(int numAlleles, int numSamples)
00383 {
00384     clearErrMsg();
00385 
00386     if (!isOpen()) {
00387         setErrMsg("Failed to skip to next sample, reader not opened.\tBlobReader: " + getBlobFile() + ", IndexFile: " + getIndexFile());
00388         return false;
00389     }
00390 
00391     if (m_fileHandle == NULL) {
00392         setErrMsg("Failed to skip to next sample, file handle is invalid.\tBlobReader: " + getBlobFile());
00393         return false;
00394     }
00395 
00396     IndexHeader& indexHeader = m_indexReader.getIndexHeader();
00397     int bytesPerSample = numSamples * indexHeader.getBytesPerSample(numAlleles);
00398     int result = 0;
00399 
00400 #ifdef WIN32
00401     result = _fseeki64(m_fileHandle, bytesPerSample, SEEK_CUR);
00402 #else
00403     result = fseeko64(m_fileHandle, bytesPerSample, SEEK_CUR);
00404 #endif
00405 
00406     return (result == 0);
00407 }

00436 bool BlobReader::readNextSample(SampleEx& sample, int numAlleles)
00437 {
00438     clearErrMsg();
00439 
00440     if (!isOpen()) {
00441         setErrMsg("Failed to read data for next sample, reader not opened.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile());
00442         return false;
00443     }
00444 
00445     if (m_fileHandle == NULL) {
00446         setErrMsg("Failed to read data for next sample, file handle is invalid.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile());
00447         return false;
00448     }
00449 
00450     IndexHeader& indexHeader = m_indexReader.getIndexHeader();
00451     size_t bytesPerSample = indexHeader.getBytesPerSample(numAlleles);
00452     size_t currentFilePosition = getCurrentFilePosition();
00453     size_t fileSize = getFileSize();
00454 
00455     if (currentFilePosition + bytesPerSample > fileSize) {
00456         setErrMsg("Failed to read data for next sample, bytes exceeded stream size.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile() + ", RemainingBytes: " + Convert::toString(fileSize - currentFilePosition) + ", Expected: " + Convert::toString(bytesPerSample));
00457         return false;
00458     }
00459 
00460     char szData[MAX_BUFFER];
00461     size_t bytesRead = fread(szData, 1, bytesPerSample, m_fileHandle);
00462     if (bytesRead != bytesPerSample) {
00463         setErrMsg("Failed to read data for next sample, read i/o error.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile());
00464         return false;
00465     }
00466     
00467     if (!sample.parse(szData, numAlleles)) {
00468         setErrMsg("Failed to parse data for next sample, data format error.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile() + ", NumAlleles: " + Convert::toString(numAlleles));
00469         return false;
00470     }
00471 
00472     return true;
00473 }

00475 bool BlobReader::readNextSampleBlock(SampleList& vSamples, int numAlleles)
00476 {
00477     clearErrMsg();
00478 
00479     if (!isOpen()) {
00480         setErrMsg("Failed to read data for next sample block, reader not opened.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile());
00481         return false;
00482     }
00483 
00484     if (m_fileHandle == NULL) {
00485         setErrMsg("Failed to read data for next sample block, file handle is invalid.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile());
00486         return false;
00487     }
00488 
00489     IndexHeader& indexHeader = m_indexReader.getIndexHeader();
00490     int bytesPerSampleBlock = indexHeader.getBytesPerSampleBlock(numAlleles);
00491     size_t currentFilePosition = getCurrentFilePosition();
00492     size_t fileSize = getFileSize();
00493 
00494     if (currentFilePosition + bytesPerSampleBlock > fileSize) {
00495         setErrMsg("Failed to read data for next sample block, bytes exceeded stream size.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile() + ", RemainingBytes: " + Convert::toString(fileSize - currentFilePosition) + ", Expected: " + Convert::toString(bytesPerSampleBlock));
00496         return false;
00497     }
00498 
00499     char szData[MAX_BUFFER];
00500     size_t bytesRead = fread(szData, 1, bytesPerSampleBlock, m_fileHandle);
00501     if (bytesRead != bytesPerSampleBlock) {
00502         setErrMsg("Failed to read data for next sample block, read i/o error.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile());
00503         return false;
00504     }
00505 
00506     int numSamples = indexHeader.getNumSamples();
00507     if (!vSamples.parseBlock(szData, numSamples, numAlleles)) {
00508         setErrMsg("Failed to parse data for next sample block, data format error.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile() + ", NumAlleles: " + Convert::toString(numAlleles));
00509         return false;
00510     }
00511 
00512     return true;
00513 }

00515 bool BlobReader::readNextWindowBlock(SampleList& vSamples, int numAlleles, int windowOffset, int windowSize)
00516 {
00517     clearErrMsg();
00518 
00519     if (!isOpen()) {
00520         setErrMsg("Failed to read data for next window block, reader not opened.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile());
00521         return false;
00522     }
00523 
00524     if (m_fileHandle == NULL) {
00525         setErrMsg("Failed to read data for next window block, file handle is invalid.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile());
00526         return false;
00527     }
00528 
00529     IndexHeader& indexHeader = m_indexReader.getIndexHeader();
00530     int numSamples = indexHeader.getNumSamples();
00531     int bytesPerSample = indexHeader.getBytesPerSample(numAlleles);
00532     int bytesPerSampleBlock = indexHeader.getBytesPerSampleBlock(numAlleles);
00533     size_t currentFilePosition = getCurrentFilePosition();
00534     size_t fileSize = getFileSize();
00535 
00536     if (currentFilePosition + bytesPerSampleBlock > fileSize) {
00537         setErrMsg("Failed to read data for next window block, bytes exceeded stream size.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile() + ", RemainingBytes: " + Convert::toString(fileSize - currentFilePosition) + ", Expected: " + Convert::toString(bytesPerSampleBlock));
00538         return false;
00539     }
00540 
00541     char szData[MAX_BUFFER];
00542     size_t bytesRead = fread(szData, 1, bytesPerSampleBlock, m_fileHandle);
00543     if (bytesRead != bytesPerSampleBlock) {
00544         setErrMsg("Failed to read data for next window block, read i/o error.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile());
00545         return false;
00546     }
00547 
00548     if (!vSamples.parseWindow(szData, numSamples, numAlleles, bytesPerSample, windowOffset, windowSize)) {
00549         setErrMsg("Failed to parse data for next window block, data format error.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile() + ", NumAlleles: " + Convert::toString(numAlleles));
00550         return false;
00551     }
00552 
00553     return true;
00554 }

00556 bool BlobReader::readIndexFile(std::string strIndexFile)
00557 {
00558     clearErrMsg();
00559 
00560     // load blob index file if available
00561     if (strIndexFile != "") {
00562         if (!m_indexReader.readFile(strIndexFile)) {
00563             setErrMsg(m_indexReader.getErrMsg());
00564             return false;
00565         }
00566     }
00567 
00568     return true;
00569 }
